title: Southern Charm Madison Comes Clean Recap /#RHONY Xmas in Miami Recap
itunes:title: Southern Charm Madison Comes Clean Recap /#RHONY Xmas in Miami Recap
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps a perfect week in Bravo programming, which includes an episode of Southern Charm where Austen and Madison break up-ish and Kathryn reveals her new man, and a #RHONY trip to Miami that was 5-star TV. Danny also touches down very briefly on ...
description:
Danny recaps a perfect week in Bravo programming, which includes an episode of Southern Charm where Austen and Madison break up-ish and Kathryn reveals her new man, and a #RHONY trip to Miami that was 5-star TV. Danny also touches down very briefly on the #RHOBH Halloween episode featuring Kim Richards and the return of the bunny. God bless us, everyone.


RHONY: 40:03ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
